name: The Ballad of Lorenzo Linguini
description:
The galactic threat of the Gloops looms large over the universe, and only one janitor is bold enough to clean up the mess! 

Help Lorenzo Linguini, our fearless custodial staff, deal with the Gloop menace. Beware, however! The Gloops are symbiotically linked; when one is destroyed, it fuses itself to neighbooring Gloops, becoming stronger and returning fire.

Can you help Lorenzo Linguini break apart the Gloop offensive? Or will they join together and eliminate the universe?

Credits:

  • Software Engineer: Joshua Dunn
  • Art Director: Logan Champlin
  • Creative Director: Adam Tomaselli
